This is to help keep track of who's who in this plotline.

After all, this does plan to be a sprawling plotline.

Let's split it into categories.

Normals : No powers whatsoever. Tend to be either tech-based or civilian.

Metahumans/Mutants : People either born with powers or given them. Aliens can be placed into this category, if they don't match the others.

Magical : People who either have magic at their fingertips, or have magical artifacts. This is separate from the normal category because of magical knowledge in the person.

Incarnations : This is for those entities who either hover the boundaries of magic, tech and metahuman; or those who are the living embodiment of something.
